verbs.description: A photo of [ARG1: presidential candidate hopeful Donald Trump] [V: sitting] [ARG2: in the The Harvard Crimson ’s chair] surrounded by a group of students surfaced — along with a lengthy , fraudulent endorsement for him as the Republican nominee , signed by The Crimson staff .
